Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: A tweet went out applauding ReplasProducts for their incredible contribution to sustainable living. These green giants upcycled over 50000 tonnes of plastics and supported local jobs all while building a circular economy. Another tweet shares that FSU Australia is taking an online approach in tackling the cost of living crisis. You really don't want to miss this! So get your fingers clicking and join in the fun.
